title: April Wine -Aladdan Theater Las Vegas,1981 ak320
description:
April Wine -Aladdan Theater  Las Vegas,1981 ak320

During the 1980’s April Wine had the strongest concert repertoire ever and the demand for appearances had never been greater. They were in demand in Canada, the United Sates, England and Germany. In fact it seemed their popularity was traveling more than they were. There was the feeling that the band could tour forever.

Whether writing the songs, producing them, or promoting them, Myles Goodwyn had been working against some kind of “deadline” for the last three years with no significant time off. He needed a break… so he took one. After a hiatus of 18 months, during which the band recorded Power Play with such cutting edge hits as Anything You Want You Got It and Enough is Enough, the band was ready to tour again. The 1982 Power Play tour was the largest tour April Wine had ever attempted.


Track List:

01 - Oowatanite
02 - Future Tense
03 - Crash & Burn
04 - Before The Dawn
05 - All Over Town
06 - Big City Girls
07 - Ladies Man
08 - Sign Of The Gypsy Queen
09 - Just Between You And Me
10 - 20th Century Schizoid Man
11 - I Like To Rock
12 - Wanna Rock
13 - Roller

Players

Myles Goodwyn – vocals, guitar (1969-1986, 1992–Present)
Brian Greenway – vocals, guitar (1977-1986, 1992–Present)
Gary Moffet – guitar, backing vocals (1973-1984)
Jerry Mercer – drums (1973-1984, 1992-2008)
Steve Lang – bass, backing vocals (1975-1984; died 2017)
